scripts.monitor: pm2 start index.js -i 1 -n monitor_html -- -i index.html -o reveal.js-master && pm2 start index.js -i 1 -n monitor_markdown -- -i slides.md -o reveal.js-master && pm2 start index.js -i 1 -n monitor_images -- -i images -o reveal.js-master
scripts.stopMonitor: pm2 delete monitor_html && pm2 delete monitor_markdown && pm2 delete monitor_images
scripts.start: cp index.html reveal.js-master; cp -r images reveal.js-master; cd reveal.js-master; npm install; npm start -- --port=8001
